org.elasticsearch.action

接口 CompositeIndicesRequest

  • 所有已知实现类:
    BulkRequest, DeleteRequest, IndexRequest, MultiGetRequest, MultiSearchRequest, MultiTermVectorsRequest, ReindexRequest

    public interface CompositeIndicesRequest
    Marker interface that needs to be implemented by all ActionRequest subclasses that are composed of multiple sub-requests which relate to one or more indices. A composite request is executed by its own transport action class (e.g. TransportMultiSearchAction), which goes through all sub-requests and delegates their execution to the appropriate transport action (e.g. TransportSearchAction) for each single item.
